title: Practical Response and Management of Cybersecurity Threats

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment optimized for office/administrative professionals, designed around real-world workplace application scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain various types of cybersecurity threats (e.g., phishing, ransomware)
Learners can outline initial response procedures in three or more stages for personal information breaches within an organization
Learners can apply basic cybersecurity defense techniques using mathematical logic (e.g., encryption principles) to workplace scenarios

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
